title: The Art of LeetCode
description: Discover the beauty of problem-solving through code and how it transforms our thinking ability to the next level...
readmore:
In this blog, we'll dive deep into the world of LeetCode and explore strategies for mastering problem-solving techniques. So, how did I start my LeetCode journey?

I began by solving at least two problems per day, without rushing. I focused on building the logic behind each solution and then visualizing it in code. Whenever I failed, I tried to think of the problem in a different way. When I couldn't figure out the logic, I took help from other people's solutions, but I made sure to keep my code the same, only upgrading it based on the logic. My goal was to build complex logic in the simplest way I could.
